home.title: FullStack Jr. Developer
home.description: I am a passionate self-taught programmer, committed to continuous learning and creative problem-solving.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I currently work as a junior full-stack developer at a company, where I use technologies such as PHP, JavaScript, SQL, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, as well as platforms like WordPress and PrestaShop.
about.description2: In my free time, I continue expanding my knowledge in React Native and Node.js, developing personal projects to improve my skills and explore new technologies.

education.title: Higher Technician in Telecommunications and IT Systems
Courses, Certifications, and Personal Programming Projects

electronics.title: Electronics Repairs
electronics.description1: Besides programming, I have always been passionate about hardware and electronics.
electronics.description2: During my time as a Technician, I worked repairing devices such as mobile phones, tablets, and computers, gaining experience in fault diagnosis, component soldering, and parts replacement.
electronics.description3: During that time, I also carried out various personal projects involving modification and repair of devices, such as mechanical keyboards, consoles, and gadgets.
